ğŸŸ¡ Viza muddatini onlayn uzaytirish â€“ oddiy va tez!

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ’» Oâ€˜zbekistonda boâ€˜lib turgan chet el fuqarolari va fuqaroligi boâ€˜lmagan shaxslar vizani my.gov.uz orqali elektron tarzda oson uzaytira olishadi.

ğŸ“±My.gov.uz bosh sahifasidagi qidiruv satriga "viza muddatini uzaytirish" deb yozing va xizmatni tanlang. Arizani kim yuborishiga qarab â€œChet el fuqarosiâ€ yoki â€œIshonchli shaxsâ€ (chet el fuqarosiga ishonchli vakil hisoblansangiz) turini belgilang.

ğŸ“Kerakli maâ€™lumotlarni toâ€˜ldiring: shaxsiy maâ€™lumotlar, pasport nusxasi, ishonchnoma fayli, vizaning maqsadi va muddati. Agar farzandlari boâ€˜lsa, ular haqidagi maâ€™lumot ham kiritiladi.

ğŸ”µSoâ€˜ngra viza muddatini uzaytirishga asos boâ€˜luvchi hujjat va pasport nusxasini yuklang. Barchasini tekshirib, arizani yuboring.

ğŸªª Murojaat 15 kun ichida koâ€˜rib chiqiladi. Tasdiqlansa, toâ€˜lov qilinadi va viza uzaytiriladi.

â–¶ï¸ https://youtu.be/4vpWy8eZdB8

translations.en:
ğŸŸ¡ Extending the visa period online is simple and fast!

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ’» Foreign citizens and stateless persons staying in Uzbekistan can easily extend their visa electronically through my.gov.uz.

ğŸ“±On the My.gov.uz home page, write "visa extension" in the search bar and select the service. Depending on who is sending the application, select the type "Foreign citizen" or "Trustee" (if you are a trustee for a foreign citizen).

ğŸ“Fill in the necessary information: personal information, passport copy, power of attorney file, purpose and duration of the visa. If they have children, information about them is also included.

ğŸ”µThen upload a copy of the passport and the document that is the basis for extending the visa period. Check everything and submit the application.

ğŸªª The appeal will be considered within 15 days. If approved, payment will be made and the visa will be extended.

â–¶ï¸ https://youtu.be/4vpWy8eZdB8

ğŸŒÂ  my.gov.uz | egov.uz
